# Ollama

DATA SCIENCE & AI

Ollama is a free, open-source platform that allows users to run large language models (LLMs) on their local machine. It's designed to make LLM technology more accessible and customizable, and can be used for a variety of tasks beyond coding

## Ollama + MotherDuck

Ollama can use MotherDuck as a DuckDB-based backend for Retrieval Augmented Generation of LLM results.

![Ollama's logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fworks_with_ollama_a306c9958f.svg&w=3840&q=75)
